desc: Status Minor is the newest musical instrument specialist on the web. We are passionate about all musical instruments and eras from the Lute to the Flute. Status Minor is run by professional musicians with over 20 years in the industry procuring, manufacturing and shipping the best instruments available online today.

layout.text: FALL SALE - 10% off All Early Musical Instruments
